text: @GregAbbott_TX Mr. Abbott, Remdesivir may not be a silver bullet for COVID-19 but it appears it saves people from dying, accelerate their recovery. To fully open TX with less risk, I would sign a binding contract with Gilead to buy a nice chunk of their supplies for our state.
